Summary: AT NIGHT, WE SAW A SPACE SHIP UP IN THE DARK SKY,
trends: There has been one other sighting in Millsap
There were no other sightings in Millsap on or around August 31st 1995
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting outside relaxing from the days heat.About 10:00 at night. Mychild saw it first and said to the effect.Look! Do you see that!Pointing to thesky. As we looked to her directing.We saw an amazing thing.Oh, it was beautifulwith all those pastel lights.It just set up there for about ten minutes and thenwent strait up and disapeared from sight.I would say it was about the size ofsoft ball at arms distance.It was just houvering about ten OCLOCK N.E. OF US.
